entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Going go to SC to place blame?

Dems are causing COVID-19 hysteria & the media is over hyping it, right?

Meanwhile containment is no longer on the table, mitigation is. Shut up, wake up and for once in your life do something GOOD for America!

I wish you would have stayed home.
